name: pemphigus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a skin condition in which painful blisters (= swellings containing liquid) form on the skin, in the mouth and nose, and on the sexual organs: He suffers from an autoimmune disorder called pemphigus. Systemic immunosuppressants are often necessary to control autoimmune diseases like pemphigus.
More examplesFewer examplesIn a person with pemphigus, the immune system mistakenly perceives the cells in skin and/or mucous membrane as foreign, and attacks them.The parts of the cells that are attacked in pemphigus are proteins called desmogleins.A diagnosis of pemphigus vulgaris was made.
